div.p: Aurelius Copreus son of Amuni(u)s (and NN, Aurelius NN son of) Sontous and Thaesis, (Aurelius NN, son of NN and NN), the three from the village Sincepha . . . presidents of the same village (celebrating?) (from the?) 17th of the present month Tybi until . . . , to Aurelius Corneli(an)us the head(?) of a group of performers from the splendid and most splendid city of the Oxyrhynchites, greetings. We have engaged you with your group . . . to take part in the festivities . . . to entertain and to play the krotala . . . (We agree?) to pay for the (days?) . . . for the whole group . . . (M. Satama)
